data.description: generate multiset bar graphs with plain HTML
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
from the README:

    Features -------- - it can display more than one data set on the
    same graphic - one can change the direction of the bars (vertical,
    horizontal) by simply changing one parameter - when used in plain
    HTML mode, the graphic (and the module) is completely independent -
    it doesn't require any graphic or graphic library - when used in
    plain HTML mode, the graphic is entirely included in the page, so by
    saving the webpage, the whole graphic is saved with it - highly
    customizable - graphics for web polls and such simple data sets can
    be quickly created, without the overhead implied by "on the fly"
    graphic generation

    man page:
    http://www.podgurschi.org/perl/HTML-BarGraph/BarGraph.pm.html sample
    output: http://www.podgurschi.org/perl/HTML-BarGraph/sample.html
